answer: FIR file karne ke liye sabse pehle login karein. Phir 'Register Complaint' page par jakar incident ki details bharein. Police verification ke baad aapki FIR darj (register) ho jayegi.
Apni FIR ka status check karne ke liye login karein aur Dashboard mein 'My Complaints' section par jayein.

questions: What documents are required for FIR?
answer: Aapko ek valid ID proof aur incident ki basic jaankari chahiye (jaise type, date, time, location). Agar koi saboot (photo/video) hai to wo bhi upload kar sakte hain.
Sabse pehle login karein. Apne dashboard se Complaint ID copy karein aur 'My Complaints' mein jakar track karein. Wahan aapko assigned officer ki details mil jayengi.
Namaste! Main aapka AI Assistant hu. Aap mujhse FIR file karne, status check karne ya kanooni jaankari ke baare mein pooch sakte hain.
